title: Bug 21108F1 Help doesn't work for global retarget actions contributed via XML
description: Bug 21108F1 Help doesn't work for global retarget actions contributed via XML
OB: GM6 create CU select the CU in the Package Explorer open popup menu goto RefactorRename press F1observe: you get help now select RefactorRename from the global menu press F1observe: you don't get help.A lot of actions in the global menu bar are effected by this.
